string.description: The name of the settings menu.
string.name: action_settings

string.description: The title of the application, which lets you watch videos that have 360 degrees of view (i.e. you can turn your head in any direction)
string.name: app_name

string.description: The message displayed when no media found on the phone.
string.name: media_not_found

resources.string: To view your own 360 videos, save them to the /Oculus/360Videos/ folder on your device.

string.description: The message displayed when an existing media file fails to play.
string.name: playback_failed

resources.string: Failed to load media for playback. Please check %1$s
